original: Berglund, Tore, chefredaktör, Uddevalla, f. 16/2/10 i Halm.stad av docent Victor B. o. Erica Westesson. G. 43 m. Greta Olsson. — Res. t. Tyskl., Belg., Frankr. 33, TyskL, Polen 34, Polen- 35, Danm. 36, Danm., TyskL, HolL, Belg., Frankr. 37, Danm., Tyskl., Tjeckoslov., Ung., Österr. 38, Norge 45, Danm. 46. Medarb. i tidn. Halland, Halmstad, 31-39, red. f. tidn. Vestkusten i Varberg 39-43, f. Boh.-Posten i Uddevalla sed. 44. Hobbies: flygning (certifikat 37), spinnfiske.
translated: Berglund, Tore, editor-in-chief, born February 16th, 1910 in Halmstad, son of docent Victor B. and Erica Westesson. Married in 1943 to Greta Olsson. - Traveled to Germany, Belgium, and France in 1933, Germany and Poland in 1934, Poland in 1935, Denmark in 1936, Denmark, Germany, Holland, Belgium, and France in 1937, Denmark, Germany, Czechoslovakia, Hungary, and Austria in 1938, Norway in 1945, and Denmark in 1946. Collaborated with the Halland newspaper in Halmstad from 1931-1939, was editor-in-chief of Vestkusten in Varberg from 1939-1943, and has been the editor-in-chief of Bohusläningen in Uddevalla since 1944. Hobbies: flying (certified in 1937) and spinning fishing.
